item.title: Hello
item.description: This is a revamp on the previous version of my website. I worked on this early thjis year. I didn’t leverage Webpack and was running the bare version of Hugo. It was used to be hosted in Gitlab Pages then GitHub Pages via Travis CI, then eventually in Vercel.
